attributes.name: generate-header
attributes.title: Generate header
attributes.description: Whether the grid should auto generate a header row

attributes.name: grid-template-columns
attributes.title: Grid template columns
attributes.description: Value that gets applied to the the css gridTemplateColumns attribute of child rows

attributes.name: no-tabbing
attributes.title: Disable tabbing
attributes.description: When true the component will not add itself or its children to the tab queue

attributes.name: selection-mode
attributes.title: Selection mode
attributes.description: Defines how the grid handles row or cell selection.

attributes.name: click-select
attributes.title: Click select
attributes.description: Determines if clicks can automatically select when selection is enabled.

attributes.name: select-row-header
attributes.title: Select row header
attributes.description: Determines if the header row is selectable when selection is enabled.

attributes.name: initial-selection
attributes.title: Initial selection
attributes.description: The initially selected grid elements. In the case of row selection the format should be a comma delimited list of row indexes. ie. '1,3,5'

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The content as data grid rows
